name: EasyHook
tagline: The reinvention of Windows API Hooking
body:
### Welcome to EasyHook.
EasyHook starts where Microsoft Detours ends.

This project supports extending (hooking) unmanaged code (APIs) with pure managed ones, from within a fully managed environment on 32- or 64-bit Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista x64, Windows Server 2008 x64, Windows 7, and Windows 8.1.

### Authors and Contributors
EasyHook was originally released by Christoph Husse in 2009 and since 2012 has been maintained by Justin Stenning (@spazzarama). The project moved from Codeplex to GitHub in August 2015.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
